duties_responsibilities.duty: Training: Work with the Help Desk and Engineering partners to validate and create the Apprentice Program training curriculum.
Vendor – Third-party Projects: Support new training content development and collaborate with Help Desk and Engineering functions.
Reporting: Support effort to develop program dashboard and real-time/on-demand reporting updates.
Coordination: Involve in multiple workstreams, supporting projects throughout the lifecycle, and building relationships with teams and vendors.
Analysis: Work with the Manager/Program SMEs to analyze project requests and document scoping materials.
Change Management: Act as a change agent by anticipating technology opportunities and proposing viable solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Economics, Finance, Accounting or a relevant field is required
